title: Blazor WebAssembly identity server 4 authentication with custom db schema and validation
body:
From visual studio i have created a new Blazor WebAssembly app with authentication (individual user accounts) .net core hosted.

The sample app created by visual studio template use:

  • sql server (ok)
  • entity framework (ok)
  • identity server 4 (ok)
  • jwt (ok)

but with a predefinite db schema and login components.

Now i would like to use my own db schema and tables, and also use my own login page and login validation, but i can't find a sample for this simple task.

Someone can help me?

Thanks
